Sound for 11077 stop-motion film by Ely Daou

11077 is a stop-motion film produced by Ely Daou from 11077 self-portraits, posing with his 11077 personal belongings (everything he possesses in Barcelona), dated April 2020. The items include 4966 small white papers that he cut in 2013.

Sound by Wissam Sader (use the Headphones)
